SEARCH
Package gw.api.desktop

Class DesktopClaimFilterSet

java.lang.Object
gw.api.filters.FilterSetBase
gw.api.claim.ClaimFilterSetBase
gw.api.claim.OwnedRelatedClaimFilterSetBase
gw.api.desktop.DesktopClaimFilterSet
public class DesktopClaimFilterSet extends OwnedRelatedClaimFilterSetBase
This is the filter set for the Claims listview, used on the desktop claims page and the admin user claims page.

Filter sets are instantiated once and shared by multiple users so they must be thread safe and must not store per user state.

Author:
cdonahue
